title: Thunderbird question on moving emails accounts at top or bottom or middle of other email accounts
content: Why cant I Move email accounts were I want them in Thunderbird, I had to delete and re-add one of my email accounts now it shows up beneath my Newsgroup account, and I want to move it above it or back to the top, as I have 9 email accounts and one newsgroup account, can you please help ?
creator: admin949

title: Search only returns old results
content: Since December 2024 I've been unable to get current emails when I perform a search in Thunderbird. Often I search for emails from a particular sender. I know I've received something from that sender within a week or two. I'm frustrated to find the search function only returns email from many months ago, when I know for a fact I got an email from the particular sender 10 or even 2 days ago. The most recent emails are just not appearing in the search results. The problem started in the last week or two of December and has continued and compounded since. I had been hoping that it would clear itself up, but no amount of re-booting my computer or the program seem to be re-settting the archive that the search function looks through. I'm coming into the tax season and I really do need the search function to support me sift through and find the details I need from my clients. Help! Thank you! Jessica McKnight
creator: jmcknight176

title: How to set up a windows thunderbird account (the main device) and a mac mini for same email
content: My desktop is a Windows 10 computer. I have a Thunderbird address currently on this computer. I am trying to add a mac mini as a server for the Audirvana music service. Can i add Thunderbird to the Mac Mini and use the same email address as on my Windows computer? When I try to sign in the Audirvana web site on the Mac Mini they are emailing back to the Windows computer. Any ideas.? Thanks ahead of time. Randy
creator: rwoods60

title: All emails disappeared from the veiw pane TB64 - latest
content:
All the emails disappeared from my msg pane (veiw pane) It was fine the first time I used it today, deleted one new message and logged off. Next use ALL msg gone. Folder pane shows they are there. Other computers can see them.

Tried repair folder. Tried DEL MSF. Tried disabling add ons

Can see them in troubleshooting mode but is nasty.

Betterbird site reports this as a known issue in V128.6.0esr (64-bit)

I've use Mozilla since Netscape but "strike a light" it's getting harder to be loyal with the amount of bugs
creator: seagullaviation

title: Clicking on images in an email no longer opens link, but zooms image
content: When I get a mail with images that are links, and I hover over or left click the image, the cursor turn into a '+' or zoom symbol, and clicking only zoom the picture. I can right click, and get a context menu with an 'open link in browser' option I looked in the settings, but can't seem to find a function to change this back to the hand that opens links. Any help would be appreciated. I'm running Thunderbird 128.6.1esr (64 bit)
creator: lahooie1

title: CREATING NEW PASSWORD
content:
Forgotten part of Thunderbird password which appears not to have been saved. Thunderbird doesn't appear on my Password list.

How can I create a new password? Arnie
